text: De, Jisasɨlɨn ŋɨmeve mɨta wofop, wata wofop, gia wata wofop, mia mɨta wofop, valan bɨkɨk malɨwale balañju malaŋmɨ mfelekeve, bɨkɨk makalowale mfanɨk. Valan pavevekandi Jisasɨtɨk galambalambaneve wokok wataŋɨle mfumfut matɨvɨvɨñiŋmaŋga. Wokok wataŋɨle mfumfut matɨvɨvɨñiŋeve balañju wofopɨn bɨkɨk mamalun valambeve. Jisasɨlɨn balañju wusandaŋ anafak ga toneve
